Benefit.name: Benefit
Benefit.description: Represents information about benefits associated with the loyalty program. Benefits are mapped to the members based on the tier or other program rules.

ImageUrl.description: The URL for the image. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

IsActive.description: Required. Indicates whether the loyalty benefit is active.

IsBenefitSelectionAllowed.description: Indicates whether a member is allowed to select the benefit (true) or not (false). This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty benefit.

PrioritySequence.description: Priority rating of the loyalty benefit.

UnitId.description: The unit of measure for quantity.

Value.description: The quantity included in the loyalty benefit.
